Steps: Login to WP admin, open sidebar and find LoveKin menu
Expected Result: LoveKin menu and submenus are visible

Test Case: Frontend pages load and protect dashboard
Steps: Open login page, register page, then dashboard while logged out
Expected Result: Login/Register load and dashboard redirects to login with short notice

Steps: Complete registration form with all required fields and submit
Expected Result: User is created and redirected to login with success notice

Steps: Try duplicate email/username and weak/mismatch password
Expected Result: Clear validation errors shown and registration blocked

Steps: Login with valid credentials on login page
Expected Result: User is logged in and redirected to dashboard

Steps: Login with wrong password
Expected Result: Generic error shown without revealing account existence

Steps: Click Forgot password and submit account email
Expected Result: Reset instructions are sent and confirmation shown

Steps: Tick Remember me and login, close and reopen browser
Expected Result: Session remains active based on remember setting

Steps: Open dashboard or protected page without login
Expected Result: Redirect to login page with short login-required notice

Steps: While logged in, open login and register page URLs
Expected Result: User is redirected to dashboard

Steps: Edit profile details (phone, occupation, city/state/country) and save
Expected Result: Saved values appear correctly after refresh

Steps: Go to LoveKin Documents admin page and upload allowed file type
Expected Result: Upload success notice appears and item shows in library list

Steps: Open dashboard Documents tab and download a file
Expected Result: Document list is visible and download works

Steps: In Archive tab upload a valid file with optional folder name
Expected Result: Upload succeeds and file appears in personal list

Steps: Upload as Member A, then login as Member B and check archive list/download
Expected Result: Member B cannot see or access Member A files

Steps: Try unsupported extension or oversize file
Expected Result: Specific error notice shown (type/size/quota) and no file added

Steps: Create a funding request from dashboard
Expected Result: Request saves and confirmation appears

Steps: Open LoveKin Funding Requests and review submitted request
Expected Result: Admin can view request details and status

Steps: Open Reports tab for different roles
Expected Result: Each role sees expected report access/data

Steps: Go to LoveKin Tools and click Generate Demo Data
Expected Result: 6 demo records are created per core dataset

Steps: Click Generate Demo Data again
Expected Result: Old demo records are reset and recreated (no duplicates)

Steps: Click Erase Demo Content and confirm
Expected Result: Only demo-tagged records are deleted

Steps: Review login/register/dashboard documents and archive on desktop and phone widths
Expected Result: Layout is readable, aligned, and functional
